title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 485.2 - What the department reviews to determine the spdes program fee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 485.2 - What the department reviews to determine the spdes program fee

State Regulations

For purposes of determining annual fees for new and
existing facilities, the department will use the design flow in the SPDES
permit to establish the average daily rate of flow. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
485.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
